description: A new ZAFT warship, created to support the nuclear-powered Freedom and Justice Gundams, which is equipped with special facilities for maintaining these unique mobile suits. In addition to a pair of METEOR units, which function as gun turrets while docked with the ship, the Eternal is armed with a single cannon turret and countless batteries of missile launchers. After it is stolen by Lacus Clyne and her followers, this ship joins forces with the Archangel and the Kusanagi to form the independent Three Ships Alliance.
name: FFMH-Y101 Eternal
